overview: Tobias is in the middle of his life, works at an art museum, divorced and living with his 16-year-old daughter. His ex-wife is struggling with her new life, his brother is looking for excitement in life by being unfaithful and his daughter longs to move away from home. Close to Tobias are also the beautiful journalist Liv and the straightforward primary school teacher Graci.
title: My Ex-Family
